autorenew_service_update_intro:
Choose your preferred renewal type (automatic or manual).
For automatic renewal, you can also choose the payment frequency.

autorenew_service_readonly_warning: This service has already been renewed and cannot be undone.
autorenew_service_at_service: Renewal is managed directly in your service

autorenew_service_disable_autorenew_desc: Automatic payment for your {{t0}} service will be disabled.

To keep using your service, you must make your next payment before the expiry date.
Failure to do so will result in your service being automatically cancelled on its expiry date, {{t0}}. All of the data associated with this service will be irreversibly deleted.
You can reactivate automatic payment up to 24 hours before the expiry date.
autorenew_service_disable_autorenew_warn: You will receive email reminders for when your service is about to expire.
autorenew_service_enable_autorenew_desc1: Automatic renewal for your {{t0}} service will be activated.
autorenew_service_enable_autorenew_desc2: Your service will be automatically renewed on {{t0}}.
autorenew_service_enable_autorenew_desc3: You will be able to set payment frequency.
autorenew_service_enable_autorenew_payme: To set up automatic payment for this service, you will need to save a valid payment method.
autorenew_service_EMAIL_DOMAIN_terminate: If you delete the MX Plan all the associated data will be permanently deleted. You will not get a refund if you delete the MX Plan.

autorenew_service_disable_all_domains_de: Automatic payment for all of your domain names will only be disabled if you are the billing contact.
To keep using your services, you must make your next payments before their expiry date.
Failure to do so will result in your services being automatically cancelled on their expiry date. All data linked to the automatic payment of your services will be irreversibly deleted.
You can reactivate automatic payment for your services up to 24 days before they expire.
autorenew_service_disable_all_domains_su: Your request to disable automatic payment has been received. It will take effect in a few hours.

paymentMean_add_message_creditCard_CA: When OVH requests debit authorisation it may appear that there has been a change in your account balance. However in reality OVH will not debit your account and nothing will appear on your bank statement.

terminate_service_information_text: The service will be cancelled when you give your confirmation. Once you do this, all data associated with this service (including any backups) will be permanently deleted, immediately and automatically. Before initiating the process and giving your confirmation, you are responsible for taking all of the necessary measures to store your personal data. OVH cannot accept any liability in this regard.
terminate_service_information_text_non_U: The service will be cancelled at the end of the renewal period. Once you confirm the cancellation, please note that all of the data associated with this service and all backups of it will be permanently deleted. You are responsible for taking the required measures to store your data before confirming that you would like your service to be deleted. Once the process has started, you cannot cancel it. OVH does not accept any responsibility for data loss in this case.
terminate_service_reason_LACK_OF_PERFORM: The service does not offer high enough performance
terminate_service_reason_NOT_NEEDED_ANYM: I am not using this solution any more
terminate_service_reason_MIGRATED_TO_ANO: I am using another OVH solution
terminate_service_reason_MIGRATED_TO_COM: I am using a solution from a different company
terminate_service_reason_NOT_RELIABLE: The solution is not reliable enough
terminate_service_reason_TOO_EXPENSIVE: The solution is not in my budget
terminate_service_reason_TOO_HARD_TO_USE: The tools (OVH Control Panel, billing) are too complicated
terminate_service_reason_FEATURES_DONT_S: The service's features are not suited to my needs
